analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol:
	Contract MilestonePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.finalize (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#510-524):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#523)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#523-524)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleBase.investInternal (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#440-502):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#449-461)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#462-468)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#477-478)

	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#449-461)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#462-468)

	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#449-461)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#462-468)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#773-790):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#775-776)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#783)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#784)

	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#781)

CrowdsaleBase.getState (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#635-664) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#649-663)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#648-663)

CrowdsaleBase.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#303-305)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#153-154)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0xfd74e5b7e6ed0b9ef7cf6dca37a5c1083b8d5a87.sol#183)
